snippet: Prime Minister Enda Kenny says the legalization of same-sex marriage will be put to a public referendum in May.
abstract: Irish Prime Min Enda Kenny says legalization of same-sex marriage will be put to public referendum in May 2015.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Enda Kenny says the legalization of same-sex marriage will be put to a public referendum in May.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
